::Decadel::

	Decadel was still underground, moving about.  He tried not to go too far,
or else he might end up away from battle, and who knows, maybe by the
enemy's base.  He popped back up behind Rush, unnoticed, and he transformed
and then did a hi-kick at Rush's head.
